headline: Why Hershey's Bitter Stock Performance Could Become Much Sweeter
summary: Hershey stock is down by more than 40% since peaking two years ago.  High cocoa prices have cut into sales, and revenue has begun to fall.  A high dividend yield and low P/E ratio could draw investors back to Hershey stock as cocoa supplies rise.
